metadata.title: CVE-2021-20226 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the io_uring in Linux kernel, where alocal attacker with a user privilege could cause a denial of serviceproblem on the system The issue results from the lack of validating theexistence of an object prior to performing operations on the object by notincrementing the file reference counter while in use. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is to data integrity, confidentiality and systemavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20226` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 5.15.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 5.15.0-1003.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 5.15.0-1005.5
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1001-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 5.15.0-24.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-24.24
No subscription required
